description.sun-moon:
Although this move has great power, it only works
the first turn the user is in battle.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
Although this move has great power, it only works
the first turn the user is in battle.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Although this move has great power, it only works
the first turn the user is in battle.
description.sword-shield:
Although this move has great power, it only works
the first turn each time the user enters battle.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage. Can only be used on the user's first turn after entering the field.
effect.shortEffect: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle.
